text: Goddam may refer to: * Adam Goddam (c. 1300–1358), English Franciscan theologian * Goddam, the parody of Gollum in the book Bored of the Rings * les goddams, a French ethnic slur for English people ==See also== * Godam * Goddamn (disambiguation) * Mississippi Goddam, a song written and performed by American singer and pianist Nina Simone
title: Goddam
